about.description: I'm a passionate designer and developer who loves to create beautiful and functional websites and applications. I have a strong eye for detail and a keen understanding of user experience. I'm always looking to learn and improve my skills and abilities.

testimonials.quote: Great to work with Himanshu! Himanshu is very responsive and skilled professional designer, who enriches your views with creativity! Will sure work with Himanshu again!
testimonials.name: William Smith

testimonials.quote: Himanshu is a great designer. He is very easy to work with and very responsive. I would highly recommend him.
testimonials.name: David Smith

testimonials.quote: He understood and executed our vision with precision and creativity. Always up to hire him again
testimonials.name: Corey Anderson

testimonials.quote: We placed our complete trust in Himanshu's hands, which more than paid off as our expectations were exceeded. We are super happy with the result.
testimonials.name: Sonja Dettmann

testimonials.quote: With his high level of professionalism and intuitive sense of digital design, Himanshu has created an incredibly customized website branding for my business that is simply mind blowing.
testimonials.name: Steve Smith

projects.name: Bidmii
projects.description: Bidmii helps you find local contractors with verified reviews, get multiple free quotes, and holds payments in trust.

projects.name: Expense Calc
projects.description: Expense Calc is a simple and easy to use expense tracking application. It is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, and it is perfect for people who want to keep track of their spending.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: BMI Calculator is a simple and easy to use application that helps you calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI).

projects.name: Angular Chat
projects.description: This is a real-time chat application built using Angular for the frontend, with a Node.js backend using Socket.io for WebSocket communication. The app allows users to join different chat rooms, exchange messages, and engage in conversations seamlessly.

projects.name: Angular Postman
projects.description: Angular Postman is a purpose-built project for efficient API testing, utilizing Angular CLI.

projects.name: Quiz Flutter
projects.description: Quiz app is a mobile application that allows users to take quizzes on various topics and subjects. The app is built using Flutter, and it is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive.

projects.name: React URL Shortner
projects.description: React URL Shortener is a simple and easy to use application that helps you shorten long URLs. Perfect for people who want to shorten their URLs.

webApplicationDevelopment.serviceDescription: We specialize in crafting high-quality web applications tailored to meet your business needs. Our team of experienced developers will work closely with you to bring your vision to life. Whether you need a custom solution from scratch or want to enhance an existing application, we've got you covered.
serviceBenefits: Customized solutions tailored to your business requirements.
Responsive design for optimal performance across all devices.
User-friendly interface to enhance user experience.
Scalable architecture to accommodate future growth.
Robust security measures to protect your data and users.
Ongoing support and maintenance to ensure smooth operation.
Additional features and integrations available upon request.

webSiteDevelopment.serviceDescription: Our website development service is designed to create stunning and functional websites that resonate with your audience. From sleek designs to seamless navigation, we ensure your online presence stands out.
serviceBenefits: Customized website design tailored to your brand identity.
Responsive layout optimized for all devices and screen sizes.
User-friendly interface for effortless navigation and engagement.
Integration of essential features like contact forms and social media links.
SEO-friendly structure to enhance visibility and search engine ranking.
Flexible and scalable solutions to accommodate future growth and expansion.
webSiteDevelopment.notice: Prices for the addOns may change based on the project scope and requirement

shopify.serviceDescription: Enhance your online store with our Shopify theme customization service. We'll tailor your Shopify theme to match your brand identity and optimize it for better user experience and conversions.
serviceBenefits: Customized Shopify theme design to reflect your brand.
Optimized for improved user experience and sales.
Responsive layout for seamless browsing on all devices.
SEO-friendly setup for better search engine visibility.
shopify.notice: Prices for the addOns may change based on the project scope and requirement

custom.serviceDescription: Our custom service offers tailor-made solutions crafted specifically to meet your unique requirements. We prioritize understanding your needs and delivering bespoke solutions that exceed your expectations. Whether you're looking to build from scratch or enhance existing functionalities, our team is here to bring your vision to life.

blogPosts.title: Website Development in React JS
blogPosts.excerpt: React follows a component-based architecture where UIs are built using reusable components. This makes the code modular, easier to understand, maintain, and scale.
